short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily import high-quality product reviews from AliExpress and Amazon with AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Import reviews from AliExpress to your Shopify store within a few clicks

Extension for Shopify Ali Reviews app https://apps.shopify.com/ali-reviews

- Increase sales by importing reviews from AliExpress into your store with only a few clicks.
- Boost your shoppers' trust and conversion rates with tons of authentic, trustworthy reviews.
- Easy to use, mobile-friendly design and setup taking only 3 minutes."
